name: Next Stop (itch)
description:
Welcome to Next Stop.

You play as a dream taxi driver tasked with taking people’s dream self towards their destination. Many times, people bring their life problems to their dreams seeking for help or for a solution. Maybe your words can help those poor souls deal with their problems in real life.

You have 10 days to help as many people as you can. How many will you be able to help?

-----------------

This is a game developed in a week for "Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1" by a team of one person!  The theme of the jam is "It is not real".

Decided to interpret that in a sense that dreams aren't real, so things that happen in there are away from reality!... or is it?

All the illustrations, UI elements, programming and writing was done by yours truly.  English isn't my main language, so I apologize for any grammar mistakes I might have made. Music and sound effects were credited at the end of the game.

Please leave a comment and feedback if possible! Thank you very much!

-------

02/27 - Known Issues: 

  • James 2nd story in one option doesn't  proceed the story. 
  • After finishing Amelia's story, either good or bad, her icon still shows up in the map, even if can't be picked anymore.

-------

CONTENT WARNING:

transphobia talk, family issues
